#labels Featured
= Release notes =

== 1.2 - Unstable Development branch ==
New features:

 * Window with Mkgmap tool help opens together with parameters files editors - Issue 102
 * Skip planet update option skips planet updates and re-splitting of regions OSM data on request - Issue 60
 * Processing parameters files for mkgmap can be edited for three stages of processing: contours preparation step, OSM maps authoring step and final gmapsupp.img creation step - Issue 53
 * New parameter at the Processing parameters page Splitter overlap controls splitter parameter --overlap - Issue 53
 * Typ files support - Issue 53

Bug fixes: 

 * SRTM 2.1 file naming bug - Issue 101

== 1.1 (Build 250) - Stable release ==
New features:

 * Regions can be newly defined by bounding polygons in addition to rectangles. Polygon definition file `<region_name>.poly` in the working directory overrides region rectangular boundaries - Issue 55
 * Planet download type changed from bz2 to pbf for !BitTorrent method - Issue 45
 * Changed installer wizard - removed "Run application when finished" option at the last installer wizard page - Issue 39
 * Added installer for !MacOsx - Issue 61
 * Added system recognition into installer. Default start-up parameters are adjusted in post-install step - Issue 21, Issue 41 and Issue 61
 * Added support for Redaction-period updates structure change after 1-st of April 2012 - Issue 65
 * Removed HTTP download for updates. Only planet file can be downloaded via HTTP, updates are downloaded via BitTorrent only - Issue 65

Bug fixes:

 * Fixed !PermGen Space error - Issue 41
 * Fixed missing license agreement when updating modules - Issue 33
 * Private tracker for BitTorrent planet updates download has been established - Issue 54
 * Minor fixes - Issue 25, Issue 35, Issue 42, Issue 49, Issue 50, Issue 51, Issue 59, Issue 63, Issue 64, Issue 69, Issue 73, Issue 75, Issue 86

== 1.0 (Build 138) - Previous stable release ==

Initial release.

This release is obsolete and is not working anymore - see UpdateRedactionPeriod Wiki.
